name: Jungle Bits
description:
Synopsis: Piwi the adorable kiwi, stuck in a jungle quest trying to escape. Collect all the fruits and key and help Piwi escape the Jungle. Beware of the robot Barrys.

Controls = Arrow Keys

Developers:

James O'Neill (Project Leader, Programmer & Level Designer)

Ewan Riddell (Environmental Artist)

Andrew Brewin (Character & Prop Artist)

Etienne Chapelot (Sound Designer & Props Artist)

Agnes Maciak (Dedicated Programmer)

Special Thanks:

Macaulay Reynolds (Voice Effect)

Chris Baker (Lecturer)

Laurie O'Mahony (Lecturer)

Michael Killick (Lecturer)
